ygData.subject: Re: BS Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve done this alot, but I m at indifferent now, so it s gonna take a while.  I can t do any of the quests except for prayer beads and orders of thunder,
ygData.messageBody:
Tony Donatelli wrote:
>
> From: "Tony Donatelli" <donatea@...>
>
> > Now if getting Bloodsabre faction were only so easy...
> >
> > Xilith
>
> Getting Bloodsaber faction IS easy. Just kill any of those Brothers Chintle,
> Estle, etc. EXCEPT for Trintle. You'll get a Bloodsaber increase every time,
> and they're like level 15 or something. Trintle is the one with the torch,
> so just let him live and kill the rest over and over, ta dah Bloodsaber
> faction.
>
> DV
>

I've done this alot, but I'm at indifferent now, so it's gonna
take a while. I can't do any of the quests except for prayer beads
and orders of thunder, which I've done a few times. I kill Brother
Drash
every time I pass by in S Karanas, and Chintle (as well as any wandering
paladin) every time I'm in W Karanas, and I'm still indifferent.
I guess it's just going to take a while, I should set up camp and just
slay away sometime...

Xilith
